summary: This is a Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York Daily Activity Report for July 26, 2019. It documents operational details, including that inmate Jeffrey Epstein was on suicide watch with an inmate companion, and notes media presence outside the institution related to a possible suicide attempt. It also lists other inmate admissions, releases, and staffing issues.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as inmate #76318-054 on suicide watch with an inmate companion. The report notes news media posted outside the institution regarding a 'possible suicide attempt'.

persons.name: Brown
persons.context: Inmate #70786-050 placed in the Special Housing Unit pending a Special Investigative Supervisor (SIS) investigation.

persons.context: New admission to MCC New York with inmate #87049-054 and also admitted to the Special Housing Unit pending classification.

connections.description: Epstein is listed as being 'on Suicide Watch w/inmate companion', indicating he was not alone in his cell.

events.title: Epstein on Suicide Watch
events.description: The daily activity report documents that inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) was on suicide watch with an inmate companion. It also notes news media were posted outside the institution regarding a 'possible suicide attempt'.

events.title: MCC Daily Operations
events.description: Standard correctional facility operations for the day, including inmate admissions, releases, placements in special housing, fire watch status, and staff shortages affecting assignments.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein (inmate #76318-054) was documented as being on suicide watch with an inmate companion on July 26, 2019.
The report notes that individuals from the news media were posted outside the MCC regarding 'Epstein #76318-054 possible suicide attempt'.
The report indicates staff shortages led to unassigned correctional officer posts, including one (10-South #2) that was unassigned during both the day and evening watch shifts.
Inmate Brown (#70786-050) was placed in the Special Housing Unit pending a Special Investigative Supervisor (SIS) investigation.
The institution's total inmate population at the beginning of the morning watch on July 26, 2019, was 770.
